params.transferId: ID of the transfer to approve

returns.history: Array of Transfer structs representing the token's transfer history

returns._0: Transfer struct containing all transfer data

params.transferId: ID of the transfer to reject

params.tokenId: ID of the token to transfer

returns.transferId: The ID of the created transfer request

approveTransfer(uint256).notice: Approve a pending transfer (recipient or admin only)

getPendingTransfer(uint256).notice: Get pending transfer ID for a token

getTokenTransfers(uint256).notice: Get all transfers for a specific token

rejectTransfer(uint256).notice: Reject a pending transfer (recipient or admin only)

requestTransfer(uint256,address).notice: Request a token transfer to the next role in the supply chain
